dict.acceptation: 文化的；教养的，修习的；耕作的，开垦的，栽培[培养]的；

sent.orig: The Cultural industry refers to industries that produces cultural products and provide cultural services.
sent.trans: 文化产业是指从事文化产品生产和提供文化服务的经营性行业。

sent.orig: It has embodied its acculturation from material cultural, system cultural, spiritual cultural 3 layers of surface.
sent.trans: 它从物质文化、制度文化、精神文化三个层面体现出了客家土楼民居的文化适应。

sent.orig: There are diversity ingredients and type. It is by cultural rights, cultural productions and cultural capital.
sent.trans: 主要表现形式为“文化权利”“文化产品”和“文化资本”，与经济利益和政治利益之间存在极其复杂的互动关系。

sent.orig: We should deepen structural reform in the cultural and actively develop cultural undertakings and cultural industries.
sent.trans: 深化文化体制改革，积极发展文化事业和文化产业。

sent.orig: Authors: Hebei Provincial Institute of Cultural Relics, Xingtai Municipal Administration of Cultural Relie.
sent.trans: 作者：河北省文物研究所，邢台市文物管理处。
